snippet.title: Balloon Fight (Iwata Edition) - R.I.P Satoru Iwata [1959-2015]
snippet.description:
*READ DESCRIPTION* Normally I don't do playthroughs of games that don't end, but this is a special occasion. We lost someone great and very important to us recently. Satoru Iwata passed away, a skilled programmer who has been at Nintendo since the very beginning of gaming. If not for him it's possible the Mother(EarthBound) series wouldn't have been made a reality, he worked on the original Mother and also saved Mother 2(EarthBound) from being scrapped due to it being a programming nightmare. He worked on many games at Nintendo including Kirby & putting the finishing touches on the Smash games like Melee. I was very saddened to see him go and all over the world shared the same hurt...he died too young.

So I bring 'Directly To You' one of the very first games he ever worked on at Nintendo, "Balloon Fight". Due to his passing, a fan hacked the game to add Iwata himself playable to honor him and I was humbled, he even has Kirby balloons *sniff*

"On my business card, I am a corporate president. In my mind, I am a game developer. But in my heart, I am a gamer." 
~Satoru Iwata

All Iwata wanted to do in his life was make games fun, fun for everyone. So 'Please Understand' that at the end of the day, gaming is not about fanboy wars & fighting...it's about fun.

I will continue to have fun Iwata, in honor of your name. Thank you for all the wonderful memories & what you've done for gaming over the years. As of now, I can already see you floating up to the heavens, Kirby balloons and all, with a smile on your face...
R.I.P Iwata-san~
